summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the payment of 1/5 of the principal amount of the judgement against the City entered in the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division, in the case of Puget Sound Power and Light Company v. Seattle, Cause No. 404-E, and for payment of costs, and interest to March 12, 1928, pursuance to agreement dated November 1,1926; and appropriating the sum of one hundred seventy-two thousand, nine hundred sixty-six and 95/100 dollars ($172,966.95) from the City Railway Fund therefor.
